roleset.name: tyrannical
roleset.note: DESPOTIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from despotic.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The reason for saying he is " audacious " is that , as a public servant , he violently beat others over a minor disagreement ; furthermore , he used a great deal of violence such as " choking " and " kicking heavily with his feet , " resulting in a " left scapula fracture and left clavicle dislocation " ; we therefore see how despotic Li is and how low his quality is during ordinary times .
